short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Destiny game themed 'New Tab' page. Easy navigation to popular sites and useful visual information.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Destiny Tab transforms your usual 'New Tab' page into a stunning 'Destiny Game' themed page. This page offers visual information to help you with your 'Destiny' gameplay alongside a quick search bar supplied with some useful 'Destiny' links.
